resources.string:
Hi my name is Alex. 

I like Zelda. 

Ocarina of time was the first game I played, and I loved it 

I don't know how many times I have played it but it's quite a lot. 

I have stopped playing it for a bit because i knew it too well and was hoping to forget a bit. 

I might play it again soon because surely by now I have forgotten some bits… maybe…
